page.title: 06Farming (cont)
page.content: {Craibstone Institute (cont)} Staff from the College's Departments of Grassland, Crop, Animal, Horticulture and Botany have stations on the Estate. As well as providing an opportunity for teaching and demonstrating by Advisory Staff to students taking the Diploma and Higher Diploma in Agriculture, Craibstone is a working farm with the following {Cropping Policy.} Hectares Cereals (mainly barley) 55.5 Potatoes 7.1 Swedes 9.1 Rotational grass 123.6 Permanent pasture 15.8 Rough grazing 40.9 Open Hill 60.7 Woodland 81.7 Total 394.4
